industries.title: For industries
points: Store cylinders upright in a ventilated, safe area away from heat and sparks.
Regularly inspect regulators, hoses, and pipelines for leaks.
Turn off valves and regulators when cylinders are not in use.
Use proper equipment to handle and move cylinders safely.
Keep fire extinguishers and emergency equipment nearby.

hotels.title: For Hotels & Restaurants
points: Install cylinders in a separate ventilated storage area.
Train staff on safe handling of LPG.

hospitals.title: For Hospitals & Healthcare
points: Store medical gases in dedicated rooms.
Keep oxygen cylinders upright and secured.
Label cylinders clearly with type and usage.
